data.meanings: To cover, conceal, keep secret, keep from site, hidden, refuge, veil/covering
data.sentence: The word مَكْنُونٌ comes from the root ك ن ن and is associated with the meanings: To cover, conceal, keep secret, keep from site, hidden, refuge, veil/covering

data.meanings: act of going/walking, going/walking around or otherwise, to go or wander about, circuited/compassed, journeyed, came to him, come upon, visitation, visit, approach, drew near, to go round or round about often, encompass,"the men/people/locusts filled the land like the TWF/flood/deluge", overpowering/overwhelming rain/water that covers,a servant that serves one with gentleness and carefulness,a detached/distinct part/portion, a piece or bit, a party/division/sect,a sort of raisins of which the bunches are composed of closely-compacted berries, a garment in which one goes round or circuits, a place of going round or round about.
data.sentence: The word وَيَطُوفُ comes from the root ط و ف and is associated with the meanings: act of going/walking, going/walking around or otherwise, to go or wander about, circuited/compassed, journeyed, came to him, come upon, visitation, visit, approach, drew near, to go round or round about often, encompass,"the men/people/locusts filled the land like the TWF/flood/deluge", overpowering/overwhelming rain/water that covers,a servant that serves one with gentleness and carefulness,a detached/distinct part/portion, a piece or bit, a party/division/sect,a sort of raisins of which the bunches are composed of closely-compacted berries, a garment in which one goes round or circuits, a place of going round or round about.

data.meanings: excited with lust, stirred up, tumultuous, period from birth to the seventeenth year, youth, young man
data.sentence: The word غِلْمَانٌ comes from the root غ ل م and is associated with the meanings: excited with lust, stirred up, tumultuous, period from birth to the seventeenth year, youth, young man

data.meanings: To shine, glitter, blaze, be bright, pearl, a perfect/complete rejoicing.
data.sentence: The word لُؤْلُؤٌ comes from the root ل ا ل ا and is associated with the meanings: To shine, glitter, blaze, be bright, pearl, a perfect/complete rejoicing.
